testCases.description: Page should have an article element
Article should have a header element
Header should have an h1 with the correct title
testCases.assertion: document.querySelector('article > header > h1')?.textContent?.includes('Future of Web Development')

testCases.description: Header should have a time element with datetime attribute
Header should have an author span
Article should have a content section
Content section should have at least 2 paragraphs
Content section should have an aside
Article should have a footer with tags list
testCases.assertion: document.querySelector('article > footer ul') !== null && document.querySelectorAll('article > footer ul li').length >= 3

hints: The <aside> can contain a tip like "Pro tip: ..." or "Note: ..."
Tags could be technology terms like HTML, CSS, JavaScript
